title: Die Veneris, 5‚Å∞ Ianuar. 1643. Committee for the Affaires of Ireland.
author: Committee of Adventurers in London for Lands in Ireland.
notes: Wing has publication year 1643 only; Thomason catalogue lists under 1644.
Calls "adventurers" interested in "carrying on the affaires of Ireland" to attend a meeting at Grocers-hall on January 9.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "vide large map" on Thomason E.81[1*].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
There are two Thomason copies of this item, numbered E.81[1*] and E.252[15].
